code: import*as __vanilla_filescope__ from'@vanilla-extract/css/fileScope';__vanilla_filescope__.setFileScope("src/nft/components/bag/BagRow.css.ts","@uniswap/interface");import{style}from'@vanilla-extract/css';import{bodySmall}from'nft/css/common.css';import{sprinkles,themeVars}from'nft/css/sprinkles.css';export var bagRow=style([sprinkles({color:'textPrimary',paddingX:'12',paddingY:'8',gap:'12',cursor:'pointer',height:'full',borderRadius:'12'}),{marginLeft:'-4px',marginRight:'-4px',':hover':{background:themeVars.colors.stateOverlayHover}}],"bagRow");export var unavailableAssetsContainer=sprinkles({background:'none',gap:'12',color:'textPrimary',paddingY:'16',marginX:'8',borderStyle:'solid',borderWidth:'1px',borderColor:'transparent',borderTopColor:'backgroundOutline',borderBottomColor:'backgroundOutline',height:'full'});export var priceChangeColumn=sprinkles({background:'none',gap:'8',color:'textPrimary',paddingY:'16',marginX:'8',borderStyle:'solid',borderWidth:'1px',borderColor:'transparent',borderBottomColor:'backgroundOutline',height:'full',cursor:'pointer'});export var priceChangeRow=style([bodySmall,sprinkles({color:'gold',gap:'4'})],"priceChangeRow");export var bagRowImage=sprinkles({width:'56',height:'56',objectFit:'cover',borderRadius:'8'});export var grayscaleImage=style({filter:'grayscale(100%)'},"grayscaleImage");export var bagRowPrice=style([sprinkles({gap:'4',fontSize:'16',fontWeight:'semibold',flexShrink:'0'}),{lineHeight:'24px'}],"bagRowPrice");export var assetName=style([sprinkles({fontSize:'16',fontWeight:'medium',overflow:'hidden',textOverflow:'ellipsis',whiteSpace:'nowrap'}),{lineHeight:'24px'}],"assetName");export var collectionName=style([bodySmall,sprinkles({overflow:'hidden',whiteSpace:'nowrap',textOverflow:'ellipsis',color:'textSecondary'})],"collectionName");export var icon=sprinkles({flexShrink:'0'});__vanilla_filescope__.endFileScope();
